name: The Crawl (Major Flex)
description:
Keyboard/Controller Controls:

-Space/A to JOIN GAME

-F/Start to BEGIN GAME

-Mouse Movement/Right Stick to PIVOT FRONT FIN

-Mouse Movement/Left Stick to PIVOT BACK FIN

-Esc/Select to EXIT

Other:

-Use a combination of controllers and mouse/keyboard for four player split-screen play

-Beat your friends in a race across the land to prove you are the most evolved in the room
